directions: Pour Sauza Blanco Tequila into pitcher with ice.  Add in 4 oz DeKuyper Triple Sec and 12 oz fresh lime juice.  Lastly add 12 oz simple syrup, stir and serve over ice.  Makes 7 delicious drinks, perfect for any ladies night in.
ingredients: 12 ounces simple syrup (equal parts water and sugar)
title: Simply Classic Sauza®-Rita
